title: Data Lists
reference-overview: The common way to present a set of information attributes.
reference-usage: Use when there is a list of data attributes to provide to the user.
reference-details: Use a Data List to present a group of related data points. Options include bulleted or unbulleted.
reference-mobile: Multiple data lists in a row will resize to fit mobile screen. Text will get slightly larger.

reference-code-html-content-block-pre: Here is a basic data list, with a few adjustments you can get a couple of different scenarios to meet your needs. For a bulleted data list just use the helper class option: mul-data-list-bulleted.
